titles.title: To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to expand the Agricultural Management Assistance Program to include the State of Hawaii.
To amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to expand the Agricultural Management Assistance Program to include the State of Hawaii.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Farm Commodities and Risk Management.

committee.name: House Agriculture
committee.subcommittee: General Farm Commodities, Risk Management, and Credit

bill.summary: Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to include Hawaii in the agricultural management assistance program.
